Tidy with broom::tidy() and checks that all arguments are used

Source: R/custom_tidiers.R
tidy_broom.Rd

Tidy with broom::tidy() and checks that all arguments are used

Usage

tidy_broom(x, ...)

Arguments

x

(a model object, e.g. glm)
A model to be tidied.

...

Additional parameters passed to broom::tidy().

See also

Other custom_tidiers: tidy_multgee(), tidy_parameters(), tidy_svy_vglm(), tidy_vgam(), tidy_with_broom_or_parameters(), tidy_zeroinfl()
